participant_1.background:
I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous.
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
i need to take my blood sugar everyday.
I am a tour guide that speaks Spanish and English.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a gummy worm collector. Do you like gummy worms?
I love gummy worms! I make them as a part of my job.
That's amazing! You're so lucky. I wish I could make gummy worms.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be really hard work.
I bet! I'm impressed that you can do it all day long. I get tired just thinking about it.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's really rewarding.
I can imagine. It's so cool that you can turn your passion into a job.
It is! I'm really grateful for it.
I'm sure you are. You're very lucky.
Thanks! What else do you like to do?
I love to cook, and I also like to travel.
I love to travel too! I've been to a lot of different places.
Me too! I've been to a few different countries.
That's awesome! I've been to a few different states.
That's still really cool! I love to travel, but I don't get to do it as often as I would like.
Me too! I wish I could travel more often.
Maybe we can go on a trip together sometime.
That would be so fun! I'd love to go on a trip with you.
